message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $175.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $190.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to counteroffer at $180.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $180. However, I'm willing to compromise again. I'll sell the product to you for $185.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counteroffer at $180.
I understand you're sticking to your price, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower, but I'm willing to meet you at $182. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to counteroffer at $180.
I'm not willing to budge on the price anymore, Bob. I'm willing to give you a final chance to meet me at $185. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your last offer. I would like to counteroffer at $180.
